title: Speed Vision Logo
content:
Any ideas? Look very much like Helvetica italic.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080420061004im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Speed_Channellogo_3977.jpg)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Speed\_Channellogo.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080420061004/http:/typophile.com/files/Speed_Channellogo.jpg) | 703.64 KB |

 [‹ Offenbach from Rudolf Koch / Hans Kühne](http://web.archive.org/web/20080420061004/http:/typophile.com/node/44295 "Go to previous forum topic") [Please Help... ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080420061004/http:/typophile.com/node/44289 "Go to next forum topic")
author: typevolcom

comments.content:
Make sure your image is RGB.

- Lex

If you mean this: [http://www.speedtv.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080420061004/http:/www.speedtv.com/ "http://www.speedtv.com/")

I think it’s a squooshed [Compacta Italic,](http://web.archive.org/web/20080420061004/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/itc/compacta_italic/) or maybe a squooshed and skewed Compacta.

- Lex
